meanings.definition: A congenital condition in males where the opening of the urethra is on the underside of the penis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that hypospadias is when the pee hole is in a different spot.
meanings.sent2: Hypospadias can affect how boys pee.
meanings.sent3: At the funny party, they joked that hypospadias made the pee go the wrong way.
meanings.sent4: His hypospadias was like a secret tunnel under his penis.
meanings.sent5: The unusual placement of the urethra in hypospadias is like a hidden surprise.

meanings.definition: Surgical repair of the urethra in cases of hypospadias.
meanings.sent1: After the surgery, the hypospadias was fixed.
meanings.sent2: The doctor performed hypospadias repair on the young boy.
meanings.sent3: The hypospadias surgery made the boy's pee hole happy again.
meanings.sent4: The hypospadias repair was like fixing a broken road.
meanings.sent5: The surgical correction of hypospadias brought relief to the family.
